hello:
Wellcum to the BALLS bot, {user}.
A bot that has BIG BALLS, made for people with BIG BALLS.
Type /help to see the list of commands.
help:
/help - shows this message
/scratch - scratches BALLS
/info - get info on your scratches
scratched: You've just scratched your BALLS, you have gained {hairs} new hairs.
info_scratched: You've scratched your BALLS {balls_scratched} times, you have {hairs} hairs total.
not_implemented: This feachure is not yet implemented.
